Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: DavidTN
Reviews.Content: This could be the worst product I have ever bought. First it is way over priced. I think I paid about $200.00 for it. When I got so sick of it I couldn't stand it anymore I bought a 19" Magnavox for $167.00. It is not the price though that made me hate this TV. Its all the little things. Like the DVD player that quit after 3 months. And things that you take for granted like the "TV Guide" feature it doesn't have. And when you change channels with the  up/down channel keys, you have to wait for each channel to come in before going to the next; very annoying. Its been awhile since I threw this TV out, but I kept thinking to myself I should warn others. So please, do not waste your money on this.
